nodes.text: Burra fish were a species of fish native to the planet of Dathomir. The Talisman of the Burra Fish turned the user into a burra fish.

Burra fish first appeared in the 1994 novel, The Courtship of Princess Leia written by Dave Wolverton. The fish was first pictured in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
